amendment.description: Amendment sought to freeze authorization amounts at FY2010 levels through FY2013 and cut funding in FY2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-255 to freeze authorization amounts at FY2010 levels through FY2013 and cut funding in FY2014.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hall (TX) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 253 (Roll no. 705).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Hall (TX).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
